name: Mimi panic WIP 2
description:
Not really sure how to use itch io. So I will put this here as a show of progress.

It seems the game will take longer than expected to make ^^;;

(I would love to finish this somehow in the next month orz)

✨✨✨ New controls ✨✨✨

Move = Left/Right

Up = Shoot

Down = Crouch

Z = Shoot

X = Sneak

Also note if your HP runs out you will lose ;;!
